0.0.1.description:
This is the initial release of our Burnout 3 Archipelago implementation. Have Fun !

⚠️ WARNING

    You need a Burnout 3 US ISO (SLUS-21050).
    You need PCSX2 Lastest Stable (v2.6.3). (Nightly doesn't work for some reason)
    Generation might fail, we are unsure why yet, just retry.
    After each Race or Crash go back to the main menu (If you don't you might see location that you don't have/don't see ones you do).

PCSX2 Settings

    Enable PINE in PCSX2
        In PCSX2, Under Tools, Check Show Advanced Settings
        In PCSX2, System ---> Settings ---> Advanced tab ---> PINE Settings, Check Enable and ensure Slot is set to 28011

YAML Options

    If you want the vanilla start add thoses item to your start_inventory (you should use Options Creator within the Archipelago Launcher) :
        Unlock Silver Lake - Race (USA)
        Silver Lake - Trailer Trash (USA)
        Compact Type 1
        Compact Type 2
        Compact Type 3
    Otherwise you will start with a random Race + Car (or a Crash if on Crash Gold Medals) (That (should (normally)) work together)
    All Gold Medals : You need to fully complete all 173 Events.
    Race Gold Medals : You need to fully complete all 73 Races.
    Crash Gold Medals : You need to fully complete all 100 Crashs.
    You can enable the Signature Takedowns (20) and/or the Crash Headline (10) to add more locations. (Trophies coming soon too)
    Option to choose Medals needed coming soon.
0.0.1.title: v0.0.1

0.0.2.description:
## Fixes  
 - World generation is fixed.
 - Client should now correctly count gold medals when in race or crash modes and display it in the GUI on connection.
 
## Improvements 
 
- Added option to choose the required number of gold medals to win (A fail-safe is added to prevent adding more medals than available events). 
- You now start with two events (a race, a crash and a car) in all mode, two races (a normal race, a special event and one car) in race mode and two crashes in crash mode.
-  Only race events are available in race mode and only crashes in crash mode.

## Game Version
- You need a PS2 Burnout 3 US ISO (`SLUS-21050`).
0.0.2.title: v0.0.2

0.0.3.description:
## Fixes  
 - Few addresses of races fixed.

## Known Issue
 - In Race Mode (and probably All Mode) the car can rarely be replaced by a filler item (Bonus Point), game should still be beatable.
 - Start Inventory doesn't work.

## Game Version
- You need a PS2 Burnout 3 US ISO (`SLUS-21050`).
0.0.3.title: v0.0.3

0.0.5.description:
## Fixes  
 - More addresses fixed.
 - More Misspellings fixed.
 - A car per class is set as progressive while the rest is set a useful (this fixes a lot of solo gen issues).
 - Start Inventory now works.

## Known Issue
 - In Race Mode (and probably All Mode) the car can rarely be replaced by a filler item (Bonus Point), game should still be beatable.
 - The game will not generate if you select too few events when solo playing.

## New Options
- Added the option to select the medal type needed to win (this will still generate the other(s) medals as this could break gen).
- Added the option to select the number of events generated (Warning selecting a low count of available event will break solo gen).

## Game Version
- You need a PS2 Burnout 3 US ISO (`SLUS-21050`).
0.0.5.title: v0.0.5

0.0.6.description:
## Fixes  
 - Mountain Parkway Signature Takedowns logic is fixed.
 - You can no longer get "Unlock" items for events that aren't generated in the seed (This also fix getting BK at the start of the run).
 - Crash events are now properly included in logic.

## Known Issue
 - In Race Mode (and probably All Mode) the starting car can rarely be replaced by a filler item (Bonus Point), game should still be beatable.
 - The game will not generate if you select too few events when solo playing.

## Game Version
- You need a PS2 Burnout 3 US ISO (`SLUS-21050`).
0.0.6.title: v0.0.6
